name: JoJo's Bizarre RPG: Battle Tendency
description:
The second part of the "JoJo's Bizarre RPG" series. Play as Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, and continue the battle against the evil forces of the stone mask and its creators. Meet new and old faces, battle stronger and even more cruel enemies and discover the backstory of the evil stone mask in an RPG style.

I do not own any of the rights to JoJo's Bizarre Adventure or any of the used graphics and audio. This is a non-profitable fan game.

If you are planing on making videos about the game, I suggest you mute the BGM sound in the game's settings. You could get copyright striked.

Comment below if you find any bugs or something doesn't work!
